duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform automotive services and repairs according to company procedures and guidelines.
Conduct customer and vehicle service including road tests, inspections, and mechanical diagnoses.
Maintain service center standards and provide on-the-job training for new technicians.
Perform physical tasks related to tire service, oil changes, alignments, brake service, and other automotive maintenance.

education_certification.credential: Valid automobile driver’s license, completion of Vocational-Technical School program in a related field, ASE certification preferred
